title: [Large-scale] Virtual Reality-based Science Inquiry Educational Tool Utilization Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital literacy, science education experience, and understanding of scientific inquiry methods (experimental design, data analysis)
context.additional_context: Structured around real-life application cases reflecting adult learners' experiences. Focuses on activities to derive evidence-based conclusions by experiencing scientific problem-solving processes in virtual reality environments.

learning_goals: Learners can simulate physics and chemistry concepts in a 3D virtual environment using VR tools, manipulate variables, and verify hypotheses.

Learners can propose â‰¥3 curriculum integration strategies for VR-based educational tools and suggest designs based on the scientific inquiry process (observation-hypothesis-experiment-analysis-conclusion).
Learners can design activities to improve students' executive functions (attention, decision-making) and scientific thinking in virtual reality environments.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
